name: Tenderly Crafted
description:
"Healing comes from understanding that you are more than your scars, more than your past and that you are tenderly and wonderfully crafted."

. . . . .

Tenderly Crafted is a short interactive story about learning to accept oneself and embrace one's flaws.

✦ Use the arrow or WASD keys to move around, explore the house, and interact with glowing objects.

. . . . .

Tools Used: https://ledoux.itch.io/bitsy  |  https://candle.itch.io/bitsy-audio

Music: A Lonely Cherry Tree by Pix

. . . . .
